title: FS/FT: T200 Chicago White Sox - Black Sox & HOFs
author: wondo

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T200 Chicago White Sox - Black Sox & HOFs
posts.post_content:
Solid SGC 45 example - good contrast.  Black Sox members Eddie Cicotte and Buck Weaver along with Hall of Famers Ed Walsh and Ray Schalk featured.  Also shown is Hal Chase.  Also looking for trades of Cobbs, specifically T202s.  Thank you.

John Wondowski
[url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url]

Price: $385
